deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.explanation: If you delete your account, then all your data on Step-Wise will be erased. This cannot be undone. Of course you can create a new account afterwards, but this account will start from zero.
deleteAccount.confirmation: Are you sure you wish to delete your account? Then enter your email address below as confirmation.
deleteAccount.invalidEmail: Failed to delete account. This email address is not coupled to your account.
deleteAccount.successfulDeletion: Your account has been deleted. You will be sent back to the home page.
